summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for Le Court Central Tennis Management App. Tested all CRUD operations for Staff, Tournaments, Events, Alerts, and Preferences endpoints. All 40 tests passed (97.5% success rate - 1 transient 520 error from Cloudflare proxy which passed on retry). All MongoDB data migrations are working correctly.

minor.issue: Intermittent 520 error (Cloudflare proxy timeout) - passed on retry, likely network transient issue

critical_code_review_comments: All API routes properly exclude MongoDB _id from responses
Circuit filtering works correctly for all 4 circuits (atp, wta, itf, itf_wheelchair)
Tournament weeks endpoint correctly groups tournaments by week and filters by circuit
Registration with 'participating' status correctly auto-hides other tournaments in same week
Event CRUD operations work correctly with proper validation
Alert generation logic works correctly based on tournament registrations
Preferences endpoint properly upserts user preferences
test_credentials: RESEND_API_KEY in backend/.env, verified email: romainbasket77@gmail.com
seed_data_creation: Seed data verified: 6 staff, 15 tournaments (9 ATP, 3 WTA, 2 ITF, 1 ITF Wheelchair), 15 events, 5 alerts, 4 weeks
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend endpoints fully tested and working. Tournament registration flow including auto-hide of same-week tournaments is working. Alert generation works based on active registrations. Email endpoints work with Resend (test mode - only sends to verified email romainbasket77@gmail.com). Frontend testing was skipped as requested.

endpoints_tested.GET /api/tournaments/weeks?circuits=atp: PASS - Returns 4 weeks with ATP tournaments
endpoints_tested.GET /api/tournaments/weeks?circuits=wta: PASS - Returns 3 weeks with WTA tournaments
endpoints_tested.POST /api/tournaments/register: PASS - Creates registration, auto-hides same week tournaments when participating
endpoints_tested.POST /api/alerts/generate: PASS - Generates alerts for missing bookings
endpoints_tested.POST /api/email/tournament-alert: PASS - Sends tournament email via Resend (test mode)
